channel.title: Blog Posts on Amir's website
channel.description: Recent content in Blog Posts on Amir's website

item.title: PICO Linux Challs
item.description: Magikarp Ground Mission We can connect to the machine via SSH and then authenticate with a password. Then if we type ls and cat the “1of3.flag.txt” file, we get the first part of the flag. We can then follow the same procedure for “instructions-to-2of3.txt”. This tells: “Next, go to the root of all things, more succinctly /”. This can be done with cd /. We then follow with ls to see the contents of the directory.

item.title: PICO Disk Forensics
item.description: Big Zip Again, download the big-zip-files.zip file from the challenge. If we run file on this file, we can see that it is a zip file. Now unzip the file and cd into its directory. To search all files and file names for a specific term, use the command: grep "<search term>" -r . Where the search term is “picoCTF” and -r is the recursive flag which will search through subdirectories.
